    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AnchorPaneConstraintsService
    Service that manages constraints
    AnchorPaneController
    This annotation should be used for all controllers, that has AnchorPane as a root element
    ColorService
    Service that manages color creation
    Constraints
    Constraints annotation is used to define layout constraints for UI elements.
    ConstraintsAnnotationProcessor
     
    ConstraintsIgnoreElementSize
    ConstraintsIgnoreElementSize annotation is used to define layout constraints for UI elements.
    FXMLBeanFactoryPostProcessor
     
    FxmlLoadedResource<T>
     
    FxmlProvider
     
    FXMLProviderConfiguration
     
    FxmlUtilService
    Util class for more convenient fxml operations
    HeaderController
     
    Initialize
    Method marked with this annotation will be called, when stage, related to this class is initialized
    InitializeAnnotationProcessor
    Calls all method marked by @Initialize
    JavaFXApplication
    JavaFx entry point
    JavaFXConfiguration
     
    JavaFxRuntimeInitializer
     
    JavaFxStartEvent
    Event that will be created once when javafx runtime is initialized
    MainScreenController
     
    PathService
    Service that manages paths
    PeriodicalScanningService
    Service for periodical project scanning
    PluginConfigProvider
     
    Project
     
    ProjectPanelController
     
    ProjectResolver
    Service for resolution of project's type
    ProjectScannerService
    Service that scans directories and finds projects
    ProjectsPanelController
     
    ProjectTypeModel
     
    ProlificApplication
    Basic spring boot class
    SettingsPopupConfiguration
     
    SpringFXConfigurationProperties
     
    StageComponent
    If this component is shown on the stage - this component must be annotated with this annotation
    StageComponentAnnotationBeanPostProcessor
     
    StageInitializeEvent
    Event that will be created when the stage is initialized
    StageShowEvent
     
    UserSettingsHolder
     
    UserSettingsService
    Service for managing user's settings
    XmlConfigConstants
     
    XmlMapperConfiguration
     
    XmlProjectScannerConfigLoaderService
    Service for loading user's plugins, that will be used in a project finding process
